Ice_ActivityInfluencedKDV.Name: Digger or catepilar on the ice

Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Name: No ice, now first ice at shore
Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Description: No ice along the shore before today.

Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Name: No ice, now first ice at site
Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Description: No ice at site before today. There may have been ice along the shore. "Site" is generally a virtual point out on the lake away from the shore.

Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Name: No ice so far, including today
Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Description: No ice this winter season, not even today.

Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Name: Last obs valid until yesterday
Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Description: Continuous observations. We can assume that the ice cover from previous observation is valid until yeaterday. Today is a new value (or the same ice cover)

Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Name: Break - Unknown until today
Ice_IceCoverBeforeKDV.Description: Break in measurements. The ice cover from previous observation is probably not valid until yeaterday.

Ice_IceCapacityKDV.Name: Ice will not hold a person

Ice_IceProblemKDV.Name: Frazil ice clog in ice channel

Snow_AvalCauseAttributeFlags.Name: The weak layer collapses easily and clean (easy propagation).
The collapsing weak layer is thin < 3 cm.
A big and identifiable crystal in the weak layer.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: In the new snow
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: Avalanches will release in the new snow.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: Between old and new snow
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: Avalanches will release between old and new snow.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: At the ground
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: Avalanches will release at the ground.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: In the old snow
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: Avalanches will release in the old snow.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: The snow cover is moist
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: The whole snow cover is moist and unstable.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: Saturated with water
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: The whole snow cover is over saturated with water and unstable.

Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Name: Only old snow
Snow_AvalReleaseHeightKDV.Description: Avalanches will release int the old snow.

Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Name: 1 - Small
Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Description: Minimal danger of burying (danger of falling)

Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Name: 2 - Medium
Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Description: Could bury, injure or kill a person

Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Name: 3 - Large
Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Description: Could bury and destroy a car, damage a truck; destroy a small building or break a few trees

Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Name: 4 - Very large
Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Description: Could bury and destroy a railway car, large truck, several buildings or a piece of forest

Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Name: 5 - Extremely large
Snow_DestructiveSizeKDV.Description: Could gouge the landscape; disastrous damage potential

DamageExtentKDV.Name: No one buried, but close call

CompetenceLevelKDV.Description: The observer has basic skills to assess avalanche danger. The observer is not educated in how regObs and Varsom communicates avalanche danger.
Experienced observer but is not educated in how regObs and Varsom communicates avalanche danger.
The observer is educated and has advanced skills in assessing avalanche danger. The observer has a basic course in how regObs and Varsom communicates avalanche danger.
The observer is educated and has advanced skills in assessing avalanche danger. The observer has an extended course in how regObs and Varsom communicates avalanche danger.
Observer has submitted relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Experienced professional with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Professional from NVE or equivalent with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Observer has submitted relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Experienced professional with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Professional from NVE or equivalent with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Observer has submitted relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Experienced professional with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Professional from NVE or equivalent with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Observer has submitted relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Experienced professional with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Professional from NVE or equivalent with several relevant observations with correct use of the Regobs forms.
Educated personel in NVE or eqivalent.

UTMSourceKDV.Name: Position from smart phone storage. Is used when curent position isnt available.

UsageFlagKDV.Name: For administarive purpose
UsageFlagKDV.Description: The observation og group has a administrative purpose. It is elswize hidden as though it has been deleted.
